question: 東京弁
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>東京</ja> is <kanji>Tokyo</kanji>, and you know that <ja>弁</ja> is <kanji>dialect</kanji>, so you have yourself <vocabulary>Tokyo dialect</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. It will help to know how to read <ja>東京</ja> already, which you should.
